data.title: Shadow of the Hegemon By Orson Scott Card
data.meta_description: Buy Shadow of the Hegemon By Orson Scott Card. Available in used condition with free US shipping on orders over $10. ISBN: 9781841490373. ISBN-10: 1841490377
data.text:
Note

This is a used book - there is no escaping the fact it has been read by someone else and it will show signs of wear and previous use. Overall we expect it to be in very good condition, but if you are not entirely satisfied please get in touch with us
